name: Ball Trap (itch)
description:
The ball has started its journey in the city to collect coins. Use the touch screen to jump over water traps and spikes. Collect bonus items to increase your speed and have more fun.

The games has 4 difficulty levels :
- Easy -- just sit back and enjoy the ride. 
- Medium -- the fun is there with a small amount of obstacles 
- Hard -- it's time to test your skills and abilities to keep the ball running 
- Extreme -- this game it getting closer to impossible to play and challenges you all the way.
